description.p: Keep your Markdown managed. Write epic tales, keep a journal, or finally write that book report.
ThiefMD is a Markdown Editor providing an easy way to organize your markdown documents.

description.p: Get things in out and done with ThiefMD.

ul.li: New File Search `Ctrl+F` and Library Search `Ctrl+Shift+F`
Import items. Just drag a docx, opt, ePUB, HTML, or whatever you feel like trying onto a folder in the Library to import
More Advanced Export Options. Change the Preview Theme, and PDF Page Size
Writing Statistics, get word count and reading count for an individual file, or a project in the library

description.p: Can ThiefMD help you write better?

ul.li: Write-Good Support, highlight potential writing issues like long sentences, passive voice, repeat words, and more
Improved theme engine. We've added luminance detection to help keep the UI usable
Add option to go brandless, lose the UI, get lost in your writing
We've launched a new theme's site and theme generator. Make ThiefMD uniquely yours

description.p: Share your writing, maybe publish that novel?

ul.li: This release fixes some bugs introduced in 0.0.8
Pandoc powered export. ePub, docx, pdf, it's now available
More export formatting options in the Preferences window
More keyboard short-cuts. Ctrl+B, Ctrl+I, you know what they do, and now they do them.
Undo/Redo history is now tied to the file. No more confusion.
Less bugs. Fixed an issue with duplicate listing in the Library.
